```{r}
red_factor_rest <- function(x, t, sex, series){
  # Mejora las mortalidades con respecto al tiempo
  k <- 0.3
  if(series == 1){
    c <- 0.625
    h <- 0.106
  } else if(series == 2){
    c <- 0.6
    h <- 0.197
  } else {
    c <- 0.566
    h <- 0.272
  }
  if(x > 65){
    alpha <- 1 + (1-c)*(x-120)/65
    f <- ((120-x)*h + (x-65)*k)/65
  } else {
    alpha <- c
    f <- h
  }
  return(alpha + (1-alpha)*(1-f)^(t/20))
}
```

```{r}
red_factor_rest(65, 53, 1, 1)
```
